overview: Founded in 2001, Uptime Devices designs and commercializes web-enabled infrastructure monitoring solutions that notify you when an environmental, security or power threat is detected. The web interface allows instant access to real-time data, graphs, logs, and control of external power devices.The products produced by Uptime Devices are scalable, reliable, easy to use and secure.Uptime Devicesâ€™ monitoring solutions have been used to monitor many applications including data centers, cold storage, power plants, manufacturing facilities, blood banks and other areas where a stable environment is vital to business operations.
